thread.title: Global slowdown looms over Asia's top airshow

title: Global slowdown looms over Asia's top airshow
text:
Global slowdown looms over Asia's top airshow 11:17am EST - 01:42 
As the Singapore Airshow gets underway, analysts are looking for signs that an eight-year industry growth cycle could be nearing an end. But as Siva Govindasamy reports, Asia is still a key target for the aviation industry, both in terms of commercial flights and military operations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
As the Singapore Airshow gets underway, analysts are looking for signs that an eight-year industry growth cycle could be nearing an end. But as Siva Govindasamy reports, Asia is still a key target for the aviation industry, both in terms of commercial flights and military operations.
